alert.note: Alert for Foster; Stutsman (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 7:25PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN FOSTER AND NORTHERN STUTSMAN COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM CDT... At 723 PM CDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Courtenay, or 20 miles north of Jamestown. This storm was nearly stationary. Additional storms were developing across north central Stutsman County. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kensal, Spiritwood Lake, Pingree, Courtenay, Melville, and Edmunds. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
